content: SYDNEY Australia's Telstra Corp Ltd on Wednesday said its $1.6 billion sale of a controlling stake in Chinese website operator Autohome Inc to Ping An Insurance Group Co of China Ltd is being challenged by minority shareholders.
name: Autohome Inc
title: Telstra says $1.6 billion Autohome stake sale is being challenged by minority shareholders

content: SYDNEY  May 25 Australia's Telstra Corp Ltd  on Wednesday said its $1.6 billion sale of a controlling stake in Chinese website operator Autohome Inc  to Ping An Insurance Group Co of China Ltd  is being challenged by minority shareholders.
name: Autohome Inc
title: Telstra says $1.6 bln Autohome stake sale is being challenged by minority shareholders

content: MELBOURNE/WELLINGTON  May 2 Australia and New Zealand shares fell on Monday  hauled down by  heavyweight banks after no.3 lender Westpac Banking Corp delivered a weaker-than-expected half year profit due to a rise in sour loans.
name: Autohome Inc
title: Australia shares fall as sour loans mar Westpac profit growth

content: MELBOURNE  May 2 Telstra Corp said on Monday it plans to return at least A$1.5 billion ($1.1 billion) to shareholders on top of its dividend in the first half of the 2017 fiscal year  using cash  from the sale of its stake in China's Autohome Inc.
name: Autohome Inc
title: Australia's Telstra to return at least $1.1 bln to shareholders

title: BRIEF-Autohome forms committee to consider "going private" proposal

title: BRIEF-Autohome Autohome says board is evaluating non-binding "going private" proposal

content: China's Autohome Inc  on Friday was made an offer to be acquired by a consortium that includes its chief executive and private equity firms in a deal that values the automobile information website operator at $3.57 billion.
name: Autohome Inc
title: Autohome CEO makes buyout offer that beats top investor's valuation

content: April 15 China's Autohome Inc on Friday was made an offer to be acquired by a consortium that includes its chief executive and private equity firms in a deal that values the automobile information website operator at $3.57 billion.
name: Autohome Inc
title: UPDATE 1-Autohome CEO makes buyout offer that beats top investor's valuation

content: * Consortium Submits Preliminary Non Binding proposal to acquire nyse-listed autohome inc.
name: Autohome Inc
title: BRIEF-Consortium submits preliminary non-binding proposal to acquire Autohome Inc

content: April 15 Autohome Inc has been made an offer to be acquired by a consortium that includes its chief executive in a deal that values the Chinese automobile information website operator at $3.57 billion.
name: Autohome Inc
title: China's Autohome gets $3.57 bln buyout offer from consortium
